title: Journalists in a circular economy: Stakeholders’ engagement in the media discourse on single-use plastics during the COVID-19 pandemic
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Aleksandra Krawczyk, Alicja Goc, Airis Pellegrini, Natalia Jaguszewska, Brenda Olivos Salas, Michał Bukowski, Małgorzata Grodzińska-Jurczak
